text:
It instead seems to look at one property: org.apache.tomcat.common.loader 
(costin checkin 8/20). Documentation (tomcat-ug.html) should be updated to 
reflect this change. The release announcement as well.
creator: katkere@praja.com

text:
I fixed the code, I don't know how it got mixed up - part of refactoring 
EmbededTomcat. Thanks for noticing this.
creator: cmanolache@yahoo.com
